Title: Manam
Writer: Harshavardhan (dialogue), Vikram K. Kumar (story & screenplay), Mukund Pandey (story development)
Actors: Akkineni Nageshwara Rao, Nagarjuna Akkineni, Naga Chaitanya Akkineni, Samantha Ruth Prabhu
Plot: Through reincarnation, family members are able to cross generations and meddle in each others' lives.
